topic.title: How do I plot head, drawdown or concentration vs. time?

para.text: How do I plot head, drawdown or concentration vs. time?
A separate program, GW_Chart, can be used to plot a number of types of data vs. time. GW_Chart is available from
. To plot the data, first select

. Then select the type of data, such as a MODFLOW head or drawdown file and other required data such as the column, row, and layer number. Finally, click the Read button to select the file and make the plot.
